functions.name: Antimicrobial
functions.description: Helps slowing the growth of micro-organisms on the skin and counteracts the development of microbes

functions.name: Antistatic
functions.description: Reduces static electricity by neutralizing electrical charge on a surface

functions.name: Emulsifying
functions.description: Promotes the formation of intimate mixtures between immiscible liquids by modifying the interfacial tension (water and oil)

functions.name: Hair conditioning
functions.description: Leaves hair easy to comb, soft, soft and shiny and / or confers volume, lightness and shine

functions.name: Surfactant
functions.description: Reduces the surface tension of cosmetics and contributes to the even distribution of the product when it is used
